HOME_PAGE.MAIN_DESCRIPTION: MerMer: A dynamic startup pioneering blockchain advancements for everyday integration.
HOME_PAGE.NOTICE_DESCRIPTION:
Beware of fraudulent activities! We want to remind you that MerMer does not provide any form of financial advice, fund investments, or portfolio management. We also do not create any contracts for our users. If you receive any communications, messages, calls, or invitations through social media platforms to join investment groups that promise high returns and low risks, please immediately contact the Anti-Fraud Hotline at 165 for verification. Do not disclose any financial or personal information to these parties. 
Stay safe from scams.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_DESCRIPTION: Unlocking the Power of Web 3.0: Redefining Business Models with Transparent, Secure Transactions.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_BLOCK_1_DESCRIPTION: Decentralized technologies like blockchain and smart contracts ensure your data remains untampered and your privacy intact.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_BLOCK_2_DESCRIPTION: Web 3.0 Unleashes Innovation Across Finance, Supply Chain, Gaming, and Beyond.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_BLOCK_3_DESCRIPTION: According to a report by the World Economic Forum, blockchain and related technologies could add over $1.7 trillion to the global economy by 2030.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_BLOCK_4_DESCRIPTION: Decentralization, Streamlined Processes, Personalized Engagement, New Revenue Models, Global Expansion, and Data Privacy Excellence.

HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_DESCRIPTION_1: Develop and maintain the official websites for various company products.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_DESCRIPTION_2: Handle Cafeca/ TideBit/ Boltchain/ iSunTV service series.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_DESCRIPTION_3: Ensure the quality of company products.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_DESCRIPTION_4: Establish and maintain automated testing processes.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_DESCRIPTION_7: Conduct technical research in collaboration with academic institutions.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_DESCRIPTION_8: Write work logs, technical reports, technical specifications, project documents, and patents. Attend meetings and give presentations.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_REQUIREMENT_1: Familiarity with front-end development frameworks such as React, RxJS, Next.js.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_REQUIREMENT_2: Proficiency in Flutter app development technology.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_REQUIREMENT_3: Familiarity with common front-end development tools like Babel, webpack, NPM.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_REQUIREMENT_4: Ability to communicate and confirm development specifications using UML.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_REQUIREMENT_5: Good English reading and writing skills.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_1_REQUIREMENT_7: Ability to identify potential software issues.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_2_REQUIREMENT_1: Familiarity with one or more backend programming languages such as Golang, Rust, Node.js.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_2_REQUIREMENT_2: Proficiency in databases like Postgresql, MongoDB, SQLite, LevelDB.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_2_REQUIREMENT_3: Familiarity with ORM and design patterns.
HIRING_PAGE.JOB_2_REQUIREMENT_4: Knowledge of RESTful API and WebSocket communication patterns.
